attributes.action: Provide a #coronabonus to every single NHS member of staff.
attributes.additional_details: We have truly seen the admiration that the general public has for our NHS. Never before have we been so appreciative of their efforts. Claps and words are all well and good, but these people who have made immeasurable sacrifices should be properly recognised for doing so.
attributes.background: Government should pay a flat fee to every single worker within the NHS in order to express how appreciative the country are for their efforts,
